titleStmt.title: The Lamentable ditty of Little Mousgrove, and the Lady Barnet to an excellent tune.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Right half sheet contains imprint and "The second part; To the same tune."
Imperfect: cropped and stained; has been cut in two parts.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
